author: perezhilton
title: Singer Joy Villa Wants To 'Make America Great Again' At The Grammys — WTF! CocoPerez.com
text:
We're all for making a statement at the Grammys , but we're not loving this!!
"Make America Great Again" and "TRUMP" were both emblazoned on this attention-seeking number worn by singer Joy Villa !
Sad.
The 25-year-old's red, white, and blue gown was fit to her curves, but the dress honestly didn't even look that well made.
You think Ivanka Trump designed it??
We're sure Donald Trump would be proud. LOLz!
[ Image via Getty Images .]
Tags: donald trump , fashion smashion , grammys , joy villa , make america great again , red carpet
